Hi there, hate to be a newb, but i cant get audio. The file plays in media player, media player classic & nero showtime but no sound and when i try to play it in quick time I get error -2041: an invalid sample description was found in the movie. any help would be appreciated as the picture looks great and was looking forward to watching it with the kids.

If i was to recomend something to use i would say VLC :) And if u still have probs with audio or video, get GSpot. GSpot is a small prog that "checks" the video file u have, then gives u info about audio and video, and most important, if u have the codecs needed to get audio and video when watching, and if u dont it tells u what codecs u need..
just google Gspot codec (remember codec or else u get a lot of hits :P )
